attributes.action: declare the Probation Service to be unfit for purpose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Probation Service completely fails to help and supervise Offenders to successfully re-enter the community and therefore fails to achieve its true purpose. Probation Officers rely on the honest of their Clients, which is patently unreal, because the same Clients only were required to be supervised by the Probation Service because had either acted dishonestly and/or lied to the Courts to avoid punishment. The Probation Service is a waste of the Public's money and Dr Reid should declare it unfit for purpose.
